item.description:
Time to put on the dancing shoes, and get out of the house. Lots of great people, and new faces having a great time.   Beautiful Ballroom / Large dance floor / Hot & Cold Hor D'ouevres / Great Music Plenty of free parking / $7 cover till 8:30 then $10 after so get there early!  Doors open at 8PM   Proper dress required.

This is open to 5 groups and last years dances averaged over 150 people. 

WhatsAngeloDoing.com has some more info to, and you can register to get in free by just sending them your name. The winners name will be posted at the front door.

Always a great High Energy fun crowd with lots of laughs.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have some tables with Singles Mingle reserved cards on them.
item.why: It's time to get out and find some new friends, and who knows? Maybe THE ONE!
item.name: Come out of hibernation and celebrate spring.
